name: Timer
description: This component allows you to display a timer and trigger an event when it completes.

properties.name: timerDate
properties.label: Timer Date
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the date and time when the timer will be stopped.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows you to specify the date, time, and time zone when the timer will expire. Signature `MM.DD.YY HH:MM:SS UTC`

properties.name: animationDuration
properties.label: Animation Duration (ms)
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the duration of the animation to change the time
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the duration of the animation to change the time.

eventHandlers.name: onTimerEnd
eventHandlers.label: On Timer End
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggers when the timer ends
